display_name: Childhood Adenotonsillectomy Trial (CHAT) Obstructive and Mixed Apnea Index (AHI): (Obstructive apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used or with arousal+ mixed apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used or with arousal) / hour of sleep from type I polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60*(oarba4 + oaroa4 + oanba4 + oanoa4 + marbpa + maropa + manrbpa + manropa) / slpprdp
